title: Weather App
description: A weather application that provides current weather conditions and forecasts for different locations. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrates with a weather API.

title: Add to Cart
description: An e-commerce feature that allows users to add items to their cart. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this project includes dynamic item addition and price calculation.

title: Task Track
description: A task tracking application that helps users manage their daily tasks. Features include task creation, editing, and completion tracking. Built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Dynamic Kanban Board
description: Dynamic Kanban Board – Built a drag-and-drop task manager with real-time updates and role-based access for productivity teams.

title: AiIntegratortech
description: Created a responsive, multi-page website for AI Integratorz using MERN stack. Integrated service sections, client logos, and contact forms to support business outreach.

title: NGO_Website
description: Orbosis Foundation Website – Created a responsive NGO site using MERN stack showcasing women empowerment programs, impact metrics, and volunteer registration.
